actions.text: Amendment SA 158 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 158 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S1431-1433) To establish the T'uf Shur Bien Preservation Trust Area within the Cibola National Forest in the State of New Mexico to resolve a land claim involving land within the Cibola National Forest and the Sandia Mountain Wilderness.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 158 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 158 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Domenici.

purpose: To establish the T'uf Shur Bien Preservation Trust Area within the Cibola National Forest in the State of New Mexico to resolve a land claim involving land within the Cibola National Forest and the Sandia Mountain Wilderness.
